cnd13:2.1: Yasmim kama na vasantiti yasmim kama na vasanti na samvasanti na avasanti na parivasantiti—
cnd13:3.1: Tanha yassa na vijjatiti tanha yassa natthi na atthi na samvijjati nupalabbhati nanaggina daddhati—
cnd13:4.1: Kathankatha ca yo tinnoti kathankatha ca yo tinno uttinno nitthinno atikkanto samatikkanto vitivattoti—
cnd13:5.1: Vimokkho tassa kidisoti vimokkho tassa kidiso kimsanthito kimpakaro kimpatibhago icchitabboti vimokkham pucchatiti—
cnd13:8.7: Yasmim kama na vasantiti yasmim kama na vasanti na samvasanti na avasanti na parivasantiti—
cnd13:10.2: Tanhati rupatanha saddatanha gandhatanha rasatanha photthabbatanha dhammatanha.
cnd13:10.4: Tanha yassa na vijjatiti tanha yassa natthi na atthi na samvijjati nupalabbhati, pahina samucchinna vupasanta patippassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddhati—
cnd13:11.1: Kathankatha ca yo tinnoti kathankatha vuccati vicikiccha.
cnd13:11.4: Kathankatha ca yo tinnoti kathankatha ca yo tinno uttinno nitthinno atikkanto samatikkanto vitivattoti—
cnd13:12.1: Vimokkho tassa naparoti natthi tassa aparo vimokkho.
cnd13:15.1: Nirasaso so uda asasanoti nittanho so, udahu satanho rupe asisati, sadde …pe…
cnd13:15.31: ditthasutamutavinnatabbe dhamme asisati sadiyati pattheti piheti abhijappatiti—
cnd13:16.2: Pannanava soti pandito pannava buddhima nani vibhavi medhavi.
cnd13:16.3: Uda pannakappiti udahu atthasamapattinanena va pancabhinnananena va micchananena va tanhakappam va ditthikappam va kappeti janeti sanjaneti nibbatteti abhinibbattetiti—
cnd13:17.4: Atha va addho mahaddhano dhanavatipi sakko.
cnd13:17.6: saddhadhanam siladhanam hiridhanam ottappadhanam sutadhanam cagadhanam pannadhanam satipatthanadhanam sammappadhanadhanam iddhipadadhanam indriyadhanam baladhanam bojjhangadhanam maggadhanam phaladhanam nibbanadhananti.
cnd13:17.7: Tehi anekavidhehi dhanaratanehi addho mahaddhano dhanavatipi sakko.
cnd13:17.8: Atha va sakko pahu visavi alamatto suro viro vikkanto abhiru acchambhi anutrasi apalayi pahinabhayabheravo vigatalomahamsotipi sakko.
cnd13:17.9: Munim aham sakka yatha vijannanti sakka yathaham munim janeyyam ajaneyyam vijaneyyam pativijaneyyam pativijjheyyanti—
cnd13:18.2: Tanti yam pucchami yam yacami yam ajjhesami yam pasademi.
cnd13:18.3: Viyacikkhati acikkhahi desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivarahi vibhajahi uttanikarohi pakasehi.
cnd13:21.1: Nirasaso so na ca asasanoti nittanho so.
cnd13:21.5: ditthasutamutavinnatabbe dhamme nasisati na icchati na sadiyati na pattheti na piheti nabhijappatiti—
cnd13:22.2: Pannanavati pandito pannava buddhima nani vibhavi medhavi.
cnd13:22.3: Na ca pannakappiti atthasamapattinanena va pancabhinnananena va micchananena va tanhakappam va na kappeti ditthikappam va na kappeti na janeti na sanjaneti na nibbatteti nabhinibbattetiti—
cnd13:23.2: Muniti monam vuccati nanam …pe… sangajalamaticca so muni.
cnd13:23.3: Evampi todeyya munim vijanati todeyya, evam munim jana patijana pativijana pativijjhati—
cnd13:24.2: Akincananti ragakincanam dosakincanam mohakincanam manakincanam ditthikincanam kilesakincanam duccaritakincanam.
cnd13:24.3: Yassetani kincanani pahinani samucchinnani vupasantani patippassaddhani abhabbuppattikani nanaggina daddhani, so vuccati akincano.
cnd13:25.1: Akincanam kamabhave asattanti akincanam puggalam kame ca bhave ca asattam alaggam alaggitam apalibuddham nikkhantam nissatam vippamuttam visannuttam vimariyadikatena cetasa viharantanti—
